about_the_game:
Overview:

Step into the thrilling world of Illegal Drift, a video game that takes you on an exciting journey through a virtual city inspired by real-world locations. With a combination of the style of GTA and NFS games, you will enjoy thrilling car chases while exploring the hidden secrets and stories of your city.

Gameplay:

The action-packed gameplay starts in the year 2000, where you open your eyes in the hospital and see the faces of your parents. As a young child, you don't remember much, so the action shifts to 2006, when as a six-year-old, you begin your adventure into education and social life. You come from a poorer family that faces hardships, but you decide your fate and future.

The gameplay offers many opportunities for exploration and interaction with the environment. You can dive, swim, drive vehicles, jump on rooftops, rob stores, shoot guns or hide in bushes from the police. Use smartphones, laptops, computers to browse the Internet, communicate with friends or listen to music on streaming services.

As you progress through the game, you will have to deal with increasingly complex choices and situations. Gain contacts that will help you survive the next days, weeks, months, or years. Will you manage to avoid illness and frequent hospital visits? Or will you succeed in the illegal world, opening up new opportunities?

Career Choices:

The teenage years pass quickly, and you are faced with an important choice - what do you want to be in the future? You can become a policeman, medic, firefighter, programmer, salesman, mechanic, or athlete. However, your choice does not guarantee that you will reach your goal, as you have to study and make further decisions. If you fail, you always have the option to improve or choose an illegal path.

Life Choices:

In the game world, life moves inexorably. Challenges and opportunities await you at every turn. Will you choose the legal path, advancing in your profession, opening your own business, or will you take the illegal path and become a drug baron, gang leader or organizer of illegal raids?

Your decisions affect the development of the storyline, and each choice leads to a different life path. In the legal path, you can achieve professional success, get promoted, or open your own business. In the illegal path, you have the chance to gain power and money, but risk the consequences of drug addiction, homelessness, imprisonment or death at the hands of other criminals.

Illegal Races:

If you choose to participate in illegal races, which usually start in parking lots or forests, out of sight of random passersby and authorities, you will need to gain access to a special app that works on the basis of invitations from already registered users.

In order to receive an invitation to the app, the player must make connections with characters associated with the world of illegal races. This can be achieved by participating in various missions or tasks that will introduce you to this environment. Once you have gained the trust of these characters, you will receive an invitation to the app and can participate in illegal raids.

The app is used for communication between rally participants, allowing you to exchange information about race locations and dates. After receiving a notification of an upcoming event, the player must go to the designated location and prepare for the race.

During illegal rallies, participants race different types of vehicles in an attempt to gain an edge over the competition and win prestigious trophies. However, the player must be careful, as participation in such events increases the risk of a run-in with the police, which can end in arrest or confiscation of the vehicle.

Success in illegal rallies brings benefits in the form of cash prizes, reputation among other participants, and opportunities to get better vehicles.

name: Illegal Drift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 7 gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Experience the thrill of the underground racing scene in Illegal Drift. Participate in high-stakes races, earn cash and reputation, and upgrade your car to become the best. But watch out for the cops and rival racers who will do whatever it takes to take you down. Are you ready to risk it all?
